column6: - In a world without Thor, the Norse end times of Ragnarà¶k takes the lives of every super-powered being, leaving only the unpowered heroes of the Marvel Universe behind! - Assembled under the leadership of Nick Fury, these powerless Defenders are all that remains to defend the planet from the Midgard Serpent!
